Google Maps Panoramio Demo

Add geo-tagged image search, places search to a map.

Example of map with three ways to discover content. Search by location (try Empire State Building) or type of location (try indian restaurant) to see icons on map. Zoom out to see photos geo-tagged to the location. Then filter photos by tag (try building). Click on a photo to see details.
